channel.title: Monacoin on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Monacoin on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Understand cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Monacoin) protocols: public and private keys
item.description: ## Overview In recent years, cryptocurrencies represented by Bitcoin and Litecoin (good or bad) are attracting much attention. Cryptocurrency is currently extremely chaotic, and hundreds of derivative currencies (Alt currencies) have been scattered up until now, but here in Japan as well, a derivative currency from Japan called “Monacoin” was born, and it is secret in 2ch corners. Is showing excitement. The author is the one who runs a so-called cryptocurrency version of gumroad’s web service called “Monapay”.
